alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 9:01AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of moderate snow showers will affect northwestern Washington...southeastern Aroostook and northeastern Penobscot Counties... At 858 AM EST...An area of moderate snow showers was near Smyrna, or 10 miles west of Houlton...moving southeast AT 40 MPH. Locations impacted include... Houlton, Patten, Danforth, Vanceboro, East Millinocket, Medway, Hodgdon, Sherman, Island Falls, Smyrna, Springfield, Amity, Topsfield, Mount Chase, Haynesville, Cary Plantation, Shin Pond, Smyrna Mills, Wytopitlock, and Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 244 and 304. US Highway 1 between Topsfield and Littleton. State Highway 11 between Medway and Patten. * Wind gusts up 35 mph are possible with these snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a mile in this area of snow showers with both falling and blowing snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Northern Penobscot; Northern Washington; Southeast Aroostook
